alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 6:04PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Texas, southeastern Cimarron, northwestern Sherman and northeastern Dallam Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 603 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Boise City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stratford, Boise City, Eva and Griggs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Oklahoma...and the Panhandle of Texas.
